interestingFacts: India is the world's largest democracy and has a diverse culture with 22 officially recognized languages.
Japan is known as the Land of the Rising Sun and is famous for its cherry blossoms and advanced technology.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest and is the largest coffee producer in the world.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent, known for its unique wildlife like kangaroos and koalas.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world and is known for its maple syrup.
Germany is known for its engineering prowess and is home to the famous Oktoberfest and over 1,500 types of sausages.
